file_content.text: No one is in here! Go away!
Don't be afraid. I'm not with the Empire; I came to help you.
I won't hurt you.
I don't need any help! I'm... fine. I'm just fine!
I've got to ask: Have you ever actually convinced anyone with that line, or are you just that optimistic?
You really think that'll work?
...Try to get people's attention, nobody listens to me. Try to avoid people, suddenly I'm the guy everyone wants to see....
Just come out here.
Those who report Republic sympathizers will be rewarded. Those who harbor the anarchists in our midst will be punished. Which would you rather be?
It's too late. You can't rescue me now, anyway.
I'm a Jedi. I assure you, you'll be safe.
Of course I can.
You can't hide in there forever. Sooner or later you'll have to come out.
Be reasonable.
You've got the best soldier in the Republic out here. This is the safest place on Hoth.
Come out, it's okay.
Come on out, you're probably not going to get to see another hero up close, you know.
You're missing my heroics.
I didn't know there was some kind of time limit on daring rescues.
Why is it too late?
Can you walk?
Please, I can't come out. Not after what I've done.
The Republic stole this planet from your people. The Empire will give it back to you, if you only let us.
I... I talked! Korl Torin tortured me, and I talked! I told him about the mines!
He led the attack on Aurek Base, and I gave him information that can kill everyone left there.
The mines under our facility are filled with an explosive gas. Korl Torin has already gone to divert it under Aurek Base.
When did you tell him this? Maybe we can still stop him if we hurry.
There's still time.
Not long ago. But... there's nothing we can do.
Once he's destroyed the base, he'll send you off to be a slave in the Unknown Regions.
That was a stupid thing to do.
I know. That's why I can't come out.
That's not going to happen.
No one can stop him. He's got an army of Imperial shock troops. Everyone on Hoth will die, and it's my fault.
You're all alone out here. The Senate doesn't care what happens to the Outer Rim. Surrender, and you can leave Hoth alive.
I know I don't deserve mercy. Call Laskin and warn him. Tell him what I've done, just... let me go.
Go, but the Empire hasn't won yet. There's still time to save your people, if you're willing to try.
Of course.
You really think so?
Maybe you're right. I could get my people... we could go for help!
If there are any Republic soldiers within fifty kilometers, we'll bring them here, I promise!
After what you've done, you deserve to rot in there.
Forget it. [Seal him in.]
No!
